data.text:
@boldyhouse No

I was living life on the edge, drinking daily and outworking it, which was slowly not working.

It was a matter of time before I got a DUI, car accident, public intoxication, a fight, or something which would tarnish my brand beyond repair.

So I stopped

@ZacSmall_ You where afraid of losing things and then made that decision since that booze was causing to much harm? 
Is that a correct understanding?
@boldyhouse I built a life where I had too much to lose
@ZacSmall_ How did you embrace that power ro just stop...
@ZacSmall_ Damn that screenshot is depressing. Just might quit caffeine just to relate less

🔥MARCH 1st Doors Close🔥

March 2nd the 31 day challenge and Men of March Class of 2022 begins.

31 Consecutive days of challenging one's self to greatness and recovery.

Join over 80 men already inside who are ready to roll: https://t.co/nAsnnP0zm2
@ZacSmall_ “100% present”💪🏾 that’s a strong phrase. I never thought of it that way..
@ZacSmall_ I have nothing against alcohol or coffee for that matter, but they aren't a personality.
